title: Lore
body:
> I hear them scream
> sharp crystals burst from the ground, impaling flesh and cracking spines.
> I circle around them and lash out at a straggler, slicing his middle apart with my claw. I crush another underfoot.
> more crystals spike from the sand to pierce flesh
> impaling the softskin as she writhes like a worm


...

So skarner(and Sivir) is allowed to brutally murder people, but graves cant have a cigar?

Nice logic.

replies.body: Because smoking in games promotes smoking, but blood and gore doesn't which is the dumbest thing I've heard
pretty sure violent blood and gore games affect people more than a little brown piece of identity... rito are monsters
